supplied: durākhyāte dharmavinaya [a] yaḥ samādāpayati bahuśaḥ pāpaṁ prasavati, evam etad bhavati yathāpi tad durākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ | svākhyāte dharmavinaye [a] yaḥ samādāpayati bahuśaḥ puṇyaṁ prasavati, evam etad bhavati yathāpi tad svākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ ||
nayaḥ | svākhyāte dharmavinaye [b] yaḥ samādāpayati bahuśaḥ puṇyaṁ prasavati, e
ādāpyate ubhāv api bahuśaḥ pāpaṁ prasavataḥ, evam eta
api bahuśaḥ puṇyaṁ prasavataḥ, evam etad bhavati yathāpi
dāpitas tathatāṁ pratipadyate sarve te bahuśaḥ pāpaṁ pra
aś ca samādāpitas tathatāṁ pratipadyate sarve te bahuśaḥ
durākhyāte dharmavinaye yathāyathā kusīdas tathātathā śreyaḥ | svākhyāte dhar
